import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { retrieveAllToDos, retrieveTodoForId } from "./api/TodoApiservice" function ToDoListComponent() { const [ToDos, setToDos] = useState([]) function refreshToDos() { retrieveAllToDos('in28Minutes') .then( (response) => { setToDos(response.data) } ) .catch( (error) => console.log(error)) } function getToDo() { retrieveTodoForId(in28Minutes,1) .then( response => console.log(response.data)) .catch( error => console.log(error)) } useEffect( () => { refreshToDos()}, [] ) return(

Things You need to do

{ ToDos.map( todo=> ) }
Id Description Status Target Date
{todo.id} {todo.description} {todo.done.toString()} {todo.targetDate.toString()}
) } export default ToDoListComponent
